config.neo4j.topic.cypher.outbox.org:
WITH $event AS event
FOREACH (_ IN CASE event.eventType WHEN 'deleted' THEN [1] ELSE [] END |
  MATCH (o:Org {biz_id: event.aggregateId})
  DETACH DELETE o
)
FOREACH (_ IN CASE event.eventType WHEN 'deleted' THEN [] ELSE [1] END |
  MERGE (o:Org {biz_id: event.aggregateId})
  ON CREATE SET o.createdAt = datetime(event.occurredAt)
  SET o += event.payload.after, o.version = event.version, o.updatedAt = datetime(event.occurredAt)
)
config.errors.deadletterqueue.topic.name: dlq.neo4j
